K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:186b-1: shr'i k'a la tsa kra ta natro tta ra tantra hri da ya n'a ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:186b-3: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud phyi ma rgyud kyi snying po zhes bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:186b-5: 'di ltar chos dbyings dkyil 'khor dri med sku la 'jam dpal gyis ni dge dang mi dge bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:186b-6: sangs rgyas pa dang mu stegs pa dag lha rnams dang ni dmyal ba nyid ces gang thob pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:186b-7: rgyal mchog pho brang shambha lar grags ka l'a pa ru ngag gi dbang phyug seng+ge yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:186b-8: gdan la bzhugs nas rgyal pos rgyud kyi rgyal po slar yang thub pa rnams la gsal bar bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:186b-9: byung gyur ces sogs bden te lha mchog bla ma khyab 'jug lha yi dbang phyug lha yi dbang po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:186b-10: zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan ma lha sa steng lha yul nam mkha' bsod nams sdig las 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:186b-11: mi rnams pha rol srid par yi dvags dmyal ba gang zhig bkag pa sha yi dam tshig can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:187a-0: rig byed pa dang thod pa @187a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:187a-1: can gyi rgyud kyi sdig pa'i bya ba de ni rdzun pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:187a-2: gang du gcan chen bdun la sogs pa dge dang mi dge'i dbang gis bram ze rnams kyang der //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:187a-3: skyes la sngar gyi lus po spangs nas lus gzhan bsam pas nges par 'dzin par 'gyur pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:187a-4: thub pa shed bu'i tshig las srog chags rnams kyi gsod byed za ba'i mthar thug brgyad du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:187a-5: sha zos pa las bram ze rnams kyang lha las sa steng 'dir lhung de ni bden pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:187a-6: bzang po tshangs pa dbang phyug khyab 'jug rnams kyi rig byed zhi chos khyab 'jug ches bla ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:187a-7: sha yi kha zas bkag la sha yi dam tshig can la rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor rgyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:187a-8: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bco lnga sogs par bde gshegs dam tshig can la sangs rgyas byang chub ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:187a-9: sangs rgyas pa yis kun nas sha mi bza' zhing bdag gi ba yis rtag tu bsrung mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:187a-10: srog chags rnams la srog chags 'du shes gsod pa'i yid kyis nye bar brtsams pas 'di nyams pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:187a-11: yan lag lnga yis srog gcod 'gyur gyi nam mkha' tsam ni srog chags rnams kyi byed po min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:187a-12: srog gcod lus dang ngag dang yid kyis rgyu rnams gsum gyis 'grub la de la longs spyod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:187a-13: skyed byed bdag nyid sems kyi rgyal po srog chags rnams ni las longs spyod pas 'jig par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:187b-0: seng+ge sprul dang ne la stag dang bya rog skye @187b gnas yan lag lnga yis srog gcod 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:187b-1: rgyal po dang ni skye rgu rnams ni byed dam byed du 'jug dang yi rang gsum gyis 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:187b-2: dge slong snying rje med pas lce la sha yi ro myong ro la rjes su tshol byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:187b-3: bdag nyid gsod pa la sogs skyon gyis dge slong rnams dang dge tshul yang ni dmyal bar 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:187b-4: dge slong nad pa la ni sman pas sha bstan na yang bya khra rnams kyis bsad pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:187b-5: pha yi ched du bsad dang mchod sbyin thog dang me dang chu dang ma zhu'i skyon gyis shi ba rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:187b-6: sbyor ba 'di rnams med par gyur na gang du de tshe bza' bar bya bar gsungs pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:187b-7: dge slong rnams la sha gang de ni stobs bcu ldan pas nad 'joms phyir yin 'chi bslu min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:187b-8: sha la sogs pa zos na nges par sa yi 'og tu lus chen rnams su sdug bsngal 'gyur; ;srog chags yi dvags la sogs skye gnas dka' thub khyim ba rgyal po nges par rang khyim du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:187b-9: gzhan gyi khyim dang chung ma longs spyod dang ni bu mo gnyen 'dun tshogs dang rang khyim rnams; ;shi ba rnams kyi lus ni gang yin chung ma bu dang bu mo gnyen 'dun tshogs ni gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:187b-10: 'dir ni rdo la gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya nyid ni rnam par blta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:187b-11: tho yor shes pa yod la rang gzhan rnam pa bral ba nyid las rdo ba'i tho yor phung por 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:187b-12: sa steng gnas su srog chags rnams kyi rig pa nyams pa'i lus la'ang yod pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:188a-0: srog chags rnams kyi srog rgyu ba ni @188a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:188a-1: rang gzhan rnam par bral bar legs par sad las shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:188a-2: sham bha la yi nyi ma'i shing rta la sogs phung po khams dang dbang po 'gro ba rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:188a-3: 'gro ba'i gzugs kyi khams la sogs pa phung po thams cad rdul phran rnams kyi rnam 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:188a-4: longs spyod byed pa rnam par rig pa tsam ste rang gzhan bral zhing rtog med de rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:188a-5: longs spyod byed min srog chags rnams kyi snang byed gang gis mun pa bral nas sad par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:188a-6: zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan dus kyi me dang mun pa gcig tu snang bar byed pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:188a-7: sa sogs dri sogs mig la sogs dang gzhu dang char pa glog dang rlung sogs drug pa gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:188a-8: de ni lus la phung po drug dang yul dang yul can de yi bya ba drug pa gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:188a-9: de rnams longs spyod byed po srog chags phung po gnyid log gyur 'dir snang byed kyis bslang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:188a-10: phyi yi bdag dang nang gi bdag dang gsum pa mchog gi bdag rnams bzhi pa las rab byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:188a-11: sprul sku longs sku dang ni de bzhin chos kyi sku rnams bzhi po las ni rab tu byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:188a-12: khong stong min zhing gcig pu mchog gyur 'byung ba las gyur tsam gyis gsum sogs thim par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:188a-13: de bzhin gsum la sogs pa gcig pu mchog gyur chos kyi dbyings su nges par thim par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:188a-14: phung po khams dang dbang po'i yan lag skye mched mun pa stug po snang ba 'od kyi mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:188b-0: rnam par shes @188b pa srog gi de nyid srid gsum 'gro bar gtogs pa'i mtha' yas byang chub chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:188b-1: dri rnams nam mkha'i me tog bzhin du yod min mkha' tsam rdul phran chos kyi dbyings la gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:188b-2: gang phyir 'gro ba 'di rnams bdag dang gsum la sogs pa sangs rgyas sku gsum la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:188b-3: yan lag nang nas nyon mongs ma rig par 'gyur slar yang len pa dang ni sred pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:188b-4: las ni 'du byed srid par 'gyur la 'dir ni gsum po zung bcas rgyu chos sdug bsngal ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:188b-5: rnam shes la sogs rnam pa lngar 'gyur de bzhin bcu gcig pa dang bcu gnyis pa yang yin; ;gsum las zung la zung las dpag tu med pa'i srid par chos bdun 'bras bu'i yan lag rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:188b-6: shing las me tog me tog las kyang 'bras bzhin gang zhig 'gro ba'i nyon mongs pa las las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:188b-7: de las sdug bsngal sdug bsngal de las nyon mongs mtha' yas 'khor lo ma lus rgyu las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:188b-8: chos rnams 'gag pa med pa nam mkha' tsam las 'byung ba'ang med pa nyid pas de yi phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:188b-9: srog chags srog gi rdul phran phung por bcas shing 'gro ba gzhan du rtag min mi rtag min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:188b-10: sbyin pa la sogs gang zhig dge bcur ldan pa gtong zhing byang chub phyogs kyi stong pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:188b-11: gang zhig de dag byed pa por 'gyur rgyal mchog sras bcas srog chags rnams kyi bdud kyi ris //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:189a-0: de las phung po rnams las de las slar yang srid gzhan @189a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:189a-1: 'pho min phung po'i mtshams sbyor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:189a-2: mar me kha ton rgya dang dri med chu dang sgra dang nyi ma chu shel sa bon skyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:189a-3: gang du rgyal ba rnams kyi chos sku dkar po'i chos kyi tshogs las byung ngo zhes bya bden //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:189a-4: chos las longs spyod rdzogs sku mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa ma lus sgra yi tshogs rnams te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:189a-5: phung po sprul pa'i sku la mchog tu 'gyur med bde ba chos sku min zhing de yi phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:189a-6: gang zhig sku yi mtshan nyid 'dir ni sangs rgyas pa yi slob dpon klu yis gang gsungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:189a-7: gang zhig gcig min du ma min la bdag gzhan la phan phun tshogs chen po'i rten gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:189a-8: dngos med dngos po med min nam mkha' bzhin du ro mnyam rnam par dpyad ka'i rang bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:189a-9: gos med rnam par 'gyur med zhi ba mtshungs pa med pa mnyam zhing khyab la spros pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:189a-10: dpe med so sor rang gis rig bya rgyal ba rnams kyi chos kyi sku la bdag phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:189a-11: gang zhig 'jig rten las 'das bsam mi khyab pa legs spyad 'bras bu bdag nyid phun sum tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:189a-12: blo ldan chen por gyur pa mnyes pa'i rgyur gyur 'khor gyi dbus su sna tshogs gsung mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:189a-13: 'jig rten kun la khyab pa rgyun mi 'chad pa rgya che'i dam chos sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:189a-14: longs spyod rdzogs sku chos kyi rgyal po chen por gnas pa de la 'dir ni bdag phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:189b-0: @189b gang zhig sems can rnams kyi smin pa'i rgyur gyur la lar me bzhin gsal bar snang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:189b-1: slar yang la lar mngon par byang chub chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu zhi ba gang mthong ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:189b-2: rnam pa du mar 'gro ba'i gzugs kyi thabs kyis 'jug cing srid pa gsum gyi 'jigs pa 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:189b-3: phyogs bcu'i rjes su 'jug pa don chen thub pa rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:189b-4: khams gsum spyod pa las grol mkha' dang mnyam par gyur pa dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:189b-5: dag cing zhi la rnam dben mchog tu zhi la rang bzhin rnal 'byor nyid kyis rtogs bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:189b-6: rtogs dka' brtag par dka' la zhi ba mi mnyam mnyam par khyab cing mtshan ma med pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:189b-7: mi mnyam bde ba rnam par mi rtog sku gcig rgyal ba rnams kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:189b-8: sangs rgyas zhing khams mtha' yas rdul phran yon tan las byung ma lus 'jig rten khams rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:189b-9: zla ba nyi ma la sogs skye gnas lha yul sa steng nam mkha' rdo rje btsun mo'i mthar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:189b-10: bud med skye gnas chos kyi dbyings su bde 'gro ngan 'gro dus kun tu ni rnam par bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:189b-11: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas srog chags phung po yul gyi yon tan ldan pa bsod nams sdig pa'i mthus; ;khu ba khrag dag rig ma'i bha ga'i padmar chud cing srog gi rlung dang rtsol ba'i rlung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:189b-12: de ni ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can du gyur pa'i skyes bu rig ma yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:190a-1: gyi yon tan las byung de long spyod pa'i gzugs sku ma yin khams la rab brten nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:190a-2: skyes pa bud med ma ning lha klu khyab 'jug rgyal ba thub ba rang las mthu las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:190a-3: gang gi de nyid de nyid lnga dang rigs gsum go 'phang yang ni gcig tu gsang ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:190a-4: zhal brgya rig 'dzin dbang po zla ba sa sogs yul dang yul can bdag po chos kyi dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:190a-5: zhal brgya pa de rgyu las gnyis skyes lag pa rkang pa'i yan lag sor mo'i tshigs rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:190a-6: de la tshor ba gsum la sogs pa nub par 'gyur ba sgra bzhin myur du 'gro bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:190a-7: gang zhig lnga dang gsum las yul dang yul can dri dang lus la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:190a-8: sa la sogs pa lnga dang zla ba nyi ma mun pa rnams kyis khams rnams rgyas btab des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:190a-9: gcig gi du ma'i khams las gnyis skyes lag ba rkang pa sor mo'i tshogs rnams gang zhig tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:190a-10: thams cad zla ba'i rgyu las mchog gi rigs brgya rgyas btab skyes pa dang ni bud med dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:190a-11: rten gyi 'byung ba'i tshogs ni rang bzhin yon tan yang ni 'jig med rdul gyi phung po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:190a-12: srog gi rgyu ni dbyangs yig la sogs rang bzhin yang ni 'jig pa med pa srog gi khams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:190a-13: khu ba'i rten ni zla ba nyi ma yang ni rdul yin las ni srog chags phung po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:190b-0: de yi thabs kyis sad par byas pas bsod nams sdig pa'i mthu las @190b 'bras bu sa gzhan du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:190b-1: rang gi las kyi phung po lngar longs spyod cing slar yang gzhan du 'ang slar yang yang gsog par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:190b-2: de yi dkar po'i bsam gtan bstod pa nges par brgya yis las kyi phung po zad pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:190b-3: gcer bu la ni las kyi phung po rnam par 'jig 'gyur sreg byed ma ni 'ba' zhig gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:190b-4: dkar po'i bsam gtan dgra bcom sngags pa dang bstod pa nges pa brgya phrag sems can lus ngag las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:190b-5: padma khyab byed snying po'i ze'i 'bru'i dbang phyug dgra bcom thig le bzang po sgom par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:190b-6: de dbus lus po sbas ba rtse mo brgya phrag 'bar ba kun nas gsal bar byed pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:190b-7: lha rnams gsang ba'i mdzod gyur mchog gi go 'phang 'di ni brgya byin rgyal po mchod 'os pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:190b-8: bsam gtan 'di ni sreg blugs za bas ma lus las kyi phung po sreg par 'gyur ba mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:190b-9: gang zhig gnod pa'i bsam gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig 'phel 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:190b-10: gang zhig gnod pa'i bsam gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig nyams 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:190b-11: gang zhig drag po'i bsam gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa 'phel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:190b-12: gang zhig drag po'i bsam gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du dre yi sdig pa nyams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:190b-13: gang zhig chos kyi bsam gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa nyams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:191a-1: gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa 'phel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:191a-2: gang zhig dkar po'i bsam gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa nyams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:191a-3: gang zhig dkar po'i bsam gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa 'phel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:191a-4: gang zhig nyin dang mtshan du 'cho ba la zhugs gyur pa de rnams sdig pa 'phel bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:191a-5: gang zhig nyin dang mtshan du 'tshe ba ldog par gyur pa de rnams kyi ni bsod nams 'phel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:191a-6: de bzhin shad nag chang dang gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa dang 'dod pas log par g-yems pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:191a-7: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams dang nges par khro ba nga rgyal 'dod pa rnams kyis 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:191a-8: gang zhig sbyin pa la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:191a-9: gang zhig sbyin pa las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa 'phel bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:191a-10: de bzhin tshul khrims bzod pa nyin dang mtshan du 'gyur la rdo rje'i brtson 'grus de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:191a-11: shes rab thabs dang smon lam stobs kyi sbyor bar ldan zhing stong nyid ye shes rdor je rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:191a-12: dngos dang dngos med byed po bsgribs dang nam mkha' 'phrog par byed pa dang ni mchog gi bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:191a-13: nam mkha' med na byed po gnas min 'dir ni gang zhig stong nyid smra ba rnams kyi tshig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:191b-0: sems can rnams @191b kyi byed por ma byas bsod nams sdig pa dus rnams kun tu rnam par 'phel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:191b-1: rgyal ba stobs bcu ldan pa ye shes can dang lha rnams longs ma spyad par 'jig pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:191b-2: so sor sdud la sogs pa drug po stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pas stong nyid sgom par gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:191b-3: mtshan mo du ba la sogs sbyor bas slar yang nyin mo nam mkha' 'bar ba la sogs pas; ;so sor sdud pas rnal 'byor pa yis dus gsum dngos po nam mkha'i dkyil du son par mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:191b-4: bsam gtan gyis kyang de la shin tu sems brtan byas pas phyi rol dngos po rnam par spong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:191b-5: srog rtsol gyis ni srog gi rlung dag nyi ma zla ba bral nas mun par rgyu bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:191b-6: dbugs kyi 'byung 'jug bral zhing slar yang 'dzin pa'i yan lag gis ni thig le 'dzin par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:191b-7: rjes su dran pas rang gi gzugs las zla ba bzhin du nam mkhar 'od mang 'phro bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:191b-8: ting nge 'dzin gyis khu ba rdo rje nas brtsams mgo bro dri med bde bas rab gang 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:191b-9: nam mkhar bltas pas gti mug rnam par 'jig par 'gyur te sna tshogs stong pa nyid mthong bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:191b-10: nang gi bdag nyid bltas pas 'dod chags 'jig par 'gyur te srog gi rlung dag bkag pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:191b-11: yan lag med par bltas pas zhe sdang 'jig par 'gyur te khu ba dri med bde ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:192a-0: sna rtser bltas pas nga rgyal 'jig par 'gyur te @192a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:192a-1: gzhom du med pa tshangs pa'i gsung las so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:192a-2: srog dang rtsol ba bkag pas sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dri ma bral ba'i dkyil 'khro yang dag pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:192a-3: gsal ba lte ba snying ga mgrin pa mgo bo rdo rje rnams su rim bzhin sa bung re /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:192a-4: khu ba gyen du song zhing khrag kyang 'og tu 'gro la tshangs dbyangs gzhom du med pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:192a-5: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dri ma gsum dang bral ba gang gis ston pa sangs rgyas nyid /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:192a-6: khyi la sogs pa'i sha yi mig dang rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis lha la sogs pa'i lha yi spyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:192a-7: rang rgyal nyan thos dag gis gzhan gyi sems rtogs shes pa sangs rgyas spyan te gsum pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:192a-8: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dri ma bral ba rnams dag bzhin pa shes rab spyan du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:192a-9: sangs rgyas rnams kyi thams cad gzigs pa dri ma gsum dang bral ba lnga pa ye shes spyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:192a-10: chu mthun dga' ba khu ba rdo rje yang ste de 'dzin pas na nges par rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:192a-11: lus kyi sa bon khu ba 'pho ste 'khor lo 'dzin pa lte ba'i 'khor lo'i bde ba gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:192a-12: mtshon bya de nyid mtshon bzhin pa yi snying ga sgra bcas bde ba mgon po 'khor ba 'jig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:192a-13: gang gis mgrin pa de rig g-yo med bde ba 'dzin pa de ni tshor byed rin chen 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:192a-14: gang gis mgo bor zla ba 'dzin pa 'di ni khu ba dri bral bde par shes rab 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:192b-0: gtsug tor tshangs pa'i @192b bu gar 'gyur med mchog gi bde ba dga' ba bcu drug rab gang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:192b-1: gang gis shes rab rang bzhin med pa mchog gi zla ba cha shas bcu drug rdzogs pa'i mtha'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:192b-2: de ni dpag med gang gis rig pa mgo bor rdor je dang bcas drug pa rdor je sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:192b-3: snang ba ye shes khams su 'gyur te gang zhig spyi bor 'gyur med rdo rje skyes bu la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:192b-4: dri bral sa yi thig le mgo bo'i skyes bu de ni chu dang nyi ma mgrin par yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:192b-5: sgra gcan me dang rnam smin snying ga sgra bcas bde ba rlung dang lte ba mjug ring ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:192b-6: gsang ba'i 'khor lor mun can bcom pa'i bde ba stong pa can ni stong pa mun pa'i khams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:192b-7: gang zhig mig la sogs pa yul can drug po lha mo rnams las sa snying la sogs gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:192b-8: gzugs ni phung po la sogs gang zhig yul drug rnams kyang lha ru brtags pa de rnams kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:192b-9: dag pa'i dbang po la sogs yul can drug po gang zhig ga rbod mdzes rgyal po la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:192b-10: de rnams khu ba mi 'pho la sogs yul drug rnams kyang sngon mo la sogs de rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:192b-11: gang zhig khro bo gshin rje gshed ni zla ba dang bcas srog rlung rab tu bcom gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:192b-12: nyi ma dang bcas srog rlung rab tu bcom 'gyur gang zhig khro bo padma mthar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:192b-13: sgrag can dang bcas srog rlung rab tu bcom pa gang zhig khro bo bgegs mthar byed pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:193a-0: mjug ring dang bcas srog rlung nges par bcom pa gang zhig @193a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:193a-1: khro bo shes rab mthar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:193a-2: srog rlung 'gags pas phyag gnyis dgyes rdor zhi ba 'dir ni nga rgyal 'joms pa rdo rje sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:193a-3: srog rlung bkag pas phyag bzhi pa yi dgyes rdor byin za zhe sdang 'joms la byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:193a-4: dgyes pa'i rdor je 'dod chags 'joms pa zhal gsum phyag drug dbang phyug sems dpa' chen por 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:193a-5: zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi gti mjug 'joms pa tshangs pa bde ba dang bcas dam tshigs sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:193a-6: lte bar srog rlung bkag pas dri ma gsum bral rdo rje sems dpa' de ni sangs rgyas nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:193a-7: snying gar bkag pas dri ma gsum bral byang chub sems dpa' rang rgyal de ni sangs rgyas nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:193a-8: mgrin par nyi ma de ni dri ma gsum bral sems dpa' chen po nyan thos nyid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:193a-9: dbral bar rlung gi dbang po 'gags pas bde ba dang bcas dam tshig sems dpa' ston pa'i sras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:193a-10: lte ba'i 'khor lor mi 'gyur mchog gi bde ba gang zhig khro bo'i dbang po'i rtsa bzhi dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:193a-11: sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan ro la ro yis bsgyur ba gang zhig bde mchog 'khor lo gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:193a-12: lag pa rkang pa'i rus pa'i dum bu brgyad dang lag mthil sor tshigs dum bu rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:193a-13: 'khor lo drug gi rtsa rnams 'dir ni nyis 'gyur bde mchog chen po'i rnal 'byor ma rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:193b-0: gtsug tor rtsa bzhi rnams su 'pho pa rnam par bral dang de bzhin chos @193b kyi 'khor lor brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:193b-1: mgrin par sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams su 'gyur te drug cu rtsa bzhi lte ba'i 'khor lo ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:193b-2: gang zhig zla ba'i cha yis gang ba mgo bor dkar po de 'dir gsang bar dkar po'i cha; ;'khor lo'i rtsa rnams kyang ni mchog tu mi 'gyur bde ba dus kyi 'khor lo lag pa'i lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:193b-3: dus ni drug cus lhag dang bcas pa'i brgya phyag gsum ste tshig mtshams rnams kyang rdo rje'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:193b-4: rgyu skar rnams kyi dbyug gu nam mkha' lag pa rgyal po de yang dang po'i sangs rgyas gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:193b-5: zla ba'i cha shas sum cu nam mkha' nam mkha' gdengs can zla ba'i rtsa ni zla bzang po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:193b-6: rtsa dang ba spu gang zhig ma lus lus la gnas pa rdo rje myu gu'i mang can te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:193b-7: rdo rje chu dang bshang pa khrag rnams lus kyi stong pa nyid kyis lce yis bldag par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:193b-8: byams pa 'i tshems kyis gtong dang lag pa rkang pa'i sha rnams zos pas des na drag po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:193b-9: mngon shes lnga yi zhal chen yul gyi phyugs kyi tshogs rnams zos pas nges na seng+ge ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:193b-10: bsod nams ye shes tshul khrims dam pa dri ma gsum bral dus kyi 'khor lo spyan gsum pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:193b-11: dpal ldan 'dus par sku rnams gang zhig yul dang yul can srog chags las kyi mthu las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:193b-12: der ni 'ga' zhig khams rnams de dag lha ru rtag tu bdud kyi rigs la gsal bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:193b-13: rtsa dang shad nag rus pa khu ba khrag rnams rdul phran 'dus pas lha rnams kyi ni gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:194a-1: so'i sangs rgyas lha yul bar snang sa steng rang rang gnas su gtso bo'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:194a-2: mdor byas rdzun gyis rim pas 'gyur la yul dang yul can sgrub byed rdo rje'i bzlas pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:194a-3: rang byin brlab pas srog rlung ri bong can du bzhi pa 'dir ni mngon par byang chub 'dod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:194a-4: 'dir ni lnga pa zung 'jug rim pa mchog tu gyur pa dpal ldan gsang ba 'dus par yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:194a-5: bdud rnams yang dag gzung phyir srid pa gsum gyi bla mas lha yi bskyed pa'i rim pa gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:194a-6: gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' dge ba bcu yi lam dang sbyin dang tshul khrims sogs las skyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:194a-7: skyes pa skye bar 'dod par 'gyur gyi yid tsam min la btags pa dang ni bdag kyang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:194a-8: bdud kyi tshig 'di dag ni rang gi yid la byed cing de 'dra'i khyab pa'i rang bzhing yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:194a-9: bsam gtan rje bo 'ga' yang yod min lha yul sa steng bsod nams tshul khrims rnam par dman //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:194a-10: stobs bcu mchog dang ldan pas rdzogs pa'i lha dag chos kyi dbyings la yang dag gnas pa de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:194a-11: bsten par bya yi lcags kyu rdo rje mda' gzhu dril bu ral gri zhags pas bsgrub pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:194a-12: bkug cing 'dir ni gzhug dang mchog tu 'jigs par gyur pa brdung zhing lag pa bcing ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:194b-0: bsam gtan 'dis ni dge ba rnam par bral nas bdud rnams shi nas ngan 'gror 'gro @194b bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:194b-1: sangs rgyas pa yi lha rnams dri ma gsum dang bral zhing sems can kyi gyi don mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:194b-2: de ni shin tu dri zhi ma me tog dri dang spos dang mar me dang ni lha ba shos dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:194b-3: gsang sangs bzlas dang bstod pa nges pa brgya yis bsten bya sgrub pa po la rab dgyes nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:194b-4: sa 'og 'jig rten lha yul sa steng bar snang rnams su grub pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa ster //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:194b-5: zla ba nyi ma'i rtsa dag bkag cing nyin mtshan dus su srog gi gsang sngags gang zhig ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:194b-6: zla ba gcig la nam mkha' nam mkha' stong pa brang 'gro dus ro mun par dbyer med bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:194b-7: steng dang 'og gnyis 'dzin pas lan gsum bral nas srog rlung gang pas rlung dag khyer bzhin pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:194b-8: grub par 'gyur te ri bong 'dzin pa lta bur nam mkhar 'gro bas rig pa 'dzin pa de; ;bsod nams don du byang chub sems dpa' thugs rjes rgyal srid chung ma bdag gi sha yang gtong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:194b-9: ye shes don du dus gsum dngos po stong pa'i gzugs brnyan mi g-yo dri bral blo byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:194b-10: tshul khrims don du khu ba rdor je mgo bor khyer la mgo nas tshangs pa'i bu ga ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:194b-11: bsod nams ye shes tshul khrims yang dag dri ma rnams par bral nas rdo rje sems dbar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:194b-12: shin tu skyon can skye bo gang zhig rgyal srid sems kyis ster ba len pas longs mi spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:195a-0: yon tan ma lus ldan pa'i chung ma sems kyis byin kyang gang zhig len @195a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:195a-2: sha dag sems kyis byin mang gang zhig sha yi dam tshig can gyis len pas longs spyod min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:195a-3: de yis byang chub sems dpa' gal te stobs bcu ldan pa de tshe dman rigs cis mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:195a-4: byams pas dka' thub mchog ni tho rangs dus su chang gi don du chang tshong khyim du 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:195a-5: nyin phyed dus su mchog gi thugs rjes nya yi don du nya pa rnams kyi tshong dus su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:195a-6: dgongs kyi dus su bud med la 'jug phyir du dga' bas bran mo rnams kyi khyim du 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:195a-7: chang nya bud med rnams kyi dri ma gsum bral aa ba dh'u ti dmang rigs cis ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:195a-8: gang dag dngos po du mar gyur pa ser skya pa ni gcig pu nyid du dam 'cha' la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:195a-9: gang gis bsgrub bya med pa nyid la brtan g-yo'i 'gro ba yod pa nyid du dam 'ca' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:195a-10: gang tshe gtan tshigs bsgrub bya dang mtshungs gyur pa de tshe sgrub pa po yis bsgrub bya min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:195a-11: gal te bsgrub bya gzhan la gtan tshigs kyang gzhan gyur pa de tshe de yi dam bca' nyams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:195a-12: sgra rnams rtag par dam bca' nam mkha' lta bur byas pa'i lus med par grub de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:195a-13: sgra rnams mi rtag dam bca' bum pa lta bur byas te shin tu rtsol bas byung ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:195a-14: nams mkha' las ni rtag bar grub kyang khyod kyi kha las sgra rnams mi rtag nges par grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:195b-0: gzugs dang reg bya dri dan @195b ro yi yul rnams bzhin du lnga pa sgra yang cis ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:195b-1: de ni gang gis thog mar rtogs pas sa steng bar snang khams su sgra des slar yang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:195b-2: rna bas don rnams rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ba de ni sgra nams rtag pa nyid yin lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:195b-3: gang gis thog mar don rtogs gyur pas sa steng bar snang khams su slar yang de tshul gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:195b-4: rna bas don rnams nges par rtogs par gyur pas de ci gzugs rnams rtag pa nyid yin nam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:195b-5: rtag pa gsal bya gcig pu yon tan ma lus rang bzhin sgra zhig rna ba'i bug par gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:195b-6: mgrin pa nas brjod gsal byed sgra yi tshogs rnams slar yang rtag par gyur pa ma yin la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:195b-7: gang zhig brjod pa gcig gis nyan byed rna ba'i bu gar sgra yi ku cor 'gyur min nam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:195b-8: rtag par mngon par gsal bya de ltar 'gyur gyi gzhan la ltos pas nus pa'ang min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:195b-9: dngos po'i byed po'i rgyu ni slar yang mun pa gsal bar byed pa gzhan na gnas pas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:195b-10: rtag pa mngon par gsal bar byas pa gang zhig rgyu yis bskyed pa 'dir ni byas pas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:195b-11: byas pa dang ni gzhan pa gang dag chos mi mthun pas grub par 'gyur ba nyid ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:195b-12: chos mi mthun par de phyir byas ba rnams ni yod par 'gyur la gcig shos de med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:195b-13: gang zhig mngon par gsal bya'i rgyur gyur mngon par gsal byed de ni ci yis rgyu ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:196a-0: mun par thim par gyur pa gang dag de yis mngon par @196a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:196a-1: gsal byas de yi 'bras bu cis ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:196a-2: sgra dang don dag gal te gcig par gyur na de tshe don nyams pa na sgra nyams 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:196a-3: spyi dang gsal ba'ang de bzhin 'gyur te nam mkha' tsam dang gzhan pa nyid dang gcig pa nying //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:196a-4: stong ba sgra dang ldan par gyur na de tshe 'jig rten gsum por rtag tu sgra med 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:196a-5: gang gis nam mkha' yod pa nyid na brtan dang g-yo ba'i 'gro ba des na med pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:196a-6: gal te nam mkha' dang ni 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi rgyu dag chos mi mthun las grub gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:196a-7: de yi rgyu las sgra dang sgra min dman par nges par sgrub pa po la nges par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:196a-8: nam mkha' sa steng dag tu gza' dang rgyu skar dag dang byol song dang ni mi rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:196a-9: lha dang srin po dang ni rang gi rigs kyi dam tshig can gyi yi dvags lha min klu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:196a-10: sngags kyi yi ge rnams kyi rang bzhin yon tan dbang las dbyibs dang kha dog rang bzhin gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:196a-11: don gcig du ma'i sgra yis kha cig tu yang don rnams mang po de ni sgra gcig gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:196a-12: dngos med stong pa'i rgyu las brtan dang g-yo ba'i dngos po rgyu rnams las ni grub pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:196a-13: dpe ni nam mkha'i me tog dang ni sa dang shing dang me tog de der rang rang grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:196a-14: mo gsham bu mo nam mkha' tsam las skyes pa nam mkhar 'gyur la bu ldan las skyes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:196b-0: bu ni 'gro ba ma lus par 'gyur shin tu phra ba'i rdul phra na phung po'i sa @196b bon las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:196b-1: sa dang chu dang me rnams lha yi de nyid khyad par rnams ni phyi dang tha dad min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:196b-2: gal te lhan cig rab tu 'jig par gyur na de tshe tha dad gzugs dang lhan cig tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:196b-3: sa dang chu me rnams lha yi de nyid gcig pa nyid du rab tu 'jig pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:196b-4: srog chags so so'i lus ni 'jig pa rnam par bral ba'i 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi lha rnams te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:196b-5: sa dang chu dang byin za rlung dang nam mkha' sbyor bas gang zhig rnam lnga'i bdag nyid lus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:196b-6: lus can rnams la yon tan bral ba'i lha rnams rnam lnga der ni mthong min yod ces grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:196b-7: srog chags rnams ni sngon gyi lus po spangs nas slar yang lus gzhan bsam pas 'dzin par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:196b-8: gang zhig sa la sogs pa'i lha rnams de yi sngon gyi lus po zhig pas rab 'jig 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:196b-9: srog chags gzugs gzhan glog gi phreng ba chen po bzhin du rab tu rgya chen gzugs can te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:196b-10: sprin bor nas ni bar snang dag la phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su mgyogs pa'i shugs kyis 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:196b-11: srog chags srog dang lhan cig bem po'i lus dang bral ba tshor ba la sogs rab ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:196b-12: srid pa sum cu rtsa gcig rnams su dge dang mi dge'i dbang gis gcig pu kho nar 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:196b-13: gcig min rnam pa lnga po yul dang bral ba nang gi bdag dang mchog gi bdag nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:196b-14: nam mkha' las 'das mi gsal min zhing mi gsal 'bras bu med min nus pa dman pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:197a-1: rang bzhin skyes bu 'byung ba min zhing srog rlung med na sems med la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:197a-2: srog chags sems dang lhan cig bde 'gro ngan 'gro dag tu las kyi 'brel pas 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:197a-3: phan tshun ltos phyir rig pa dang ni bem po dag dang rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:197a-4: phan tshun ltos phyir gang tshe 'byung ba'i tshogs rnams yongs su gyur par rab tu 'byung bas na; ;ther zug pa yang 'gyur ba nyid pas de tshe 'byung ba'i chos rnams 'gyur bar nges pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:197a-5: thams cad 'gyur med rtag pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur yang na gang zhig rtag pa nyid ni 'gyur ba med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:197a-6: ther zug pa dang ther zug dman pa'i skyes bu khyab bdag gis ni srid sgrub la bshad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:197a-7: phan tshun ltos phyir rig pa dang ni rig bdag kyang ni rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:197a-8: phan tshun ltos phyir byas pa min dang byas pa dag kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:197a-9: phan tshun ltos phyir byas pa dag dang byas pa yang ni rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:197a-10: thams cad rnam par rig pa tsam ste sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha'i khams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:197a-11: gzugs dang reg bya sgra dang dri dang bcas pa'i bde ba rdul phran phung por gyur pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:197a-12: rnam par shes las 'bras bu'i dngos po rang byung ba las min zhing med dang 'dren mas min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:197a-13: sa bon las ni myu gu la sogs bzhin du 'gyur gyi rang las min zhing rgyu med min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:197b-0: rkang dang rus pa @197b chu ba sha dang khu khrag tshil bu pags pa rdul phran phung bo min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:197b-1: rnam par rig pa tsam zhig spangs nas slar yang srid pa gzhan du rnam rig tsam zhig 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:197b-2: der ni lus len slar yang srid ba gzhan du de yang rnam rig tsam pa de nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:197b-3: 'dod chags gnyid log gyur na rang gzhan bral ba rnam rig tsam po rnam par nyams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:197b-4: gal te 'gro ba rnam rig tsam du gyur na 'dir ni don gzhan rnam par rig tsam du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:197b-5: de 'gyur gal te 'gro ba rnam rig tsam na de tshe gnyis med min te de gnyis phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:197b-6: gang zhig 'di yi ma rig blo bur ba ste lhan skyes gyur pa de ni rnam rig min; ;sngon du rnam par dag pa lhan skyes bem po yang ni rig pa rnam dag 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:197b-7: bem po ma lus rnam par rig pa tsam du 'gro bas sad pa'i tshe na rab tu rtogs pas grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:197b-8: de yi rnam rig mi snang bar 'gyur yang na rang gnas tshangs pa dbang phyug la sogs 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:197b-9: bye brag par 'gyur yang na ser skya'i 'dod par 'gyur te sa bon nang na myu gu sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:197b-10: gcig phyir 'bras bu yod par smra bar 'gyur te brgya la rtag pa cung zad yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:197b-11: thog mar phra rab rdul gyi phung po 'gro ba'i cha med gang gi rdul phran nam mkha' la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:197b-12: phra rab rdul rnams 'dus pa'i 'gro ba las kyang 'gro ba'i srid pa rdul phran phung po min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:197b-13: rdul phran bral te nam mkhar gnas pa las gzhan 'gro ba rnams kyi rnam par 'jig pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:198a-0: gal te lus po rdul phran @198a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:198a-1: phung por gyur na de tshe su yi lus po 'jig par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:198a-2: 'byung ba brtags pa med las gzhan du rdul phran bral min gang gi rdul phran de rdul kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:198a-3: sdud dang skyed pa bral bas nam mkha'i dkyil la gnas te rlung dang ldan dang mi ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:198a-4: phra rab rdul rnams cha shas drug la slar yang cha shas drug ste slar yang gang gi cha shas drug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:198a-5: de yi cha shas phra rab cha yis nam mkha'i khams 'di gang bar cis mi 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:198a-6: dngul chu nor bu'i rdul phran cha bcas cha med tshad ma dag gis bsgrub byar gyur pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:198a-7: cha dang bcas na zangs ma 'bigs min rdo yang min la rdul phran phung po cha med min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:198a-8: dngul chus zangs ma reg cing gnyis skyes nor bus rdo ba lha yi rin po cher 'gyur la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:198a-9: rnam par shes pa rnam rtog drug gi nye bar nyams pa rdul phran phung po'i rnam 'gyur min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:198a-10: phyi rol sngon po'i gzugs la gang zhig rdul phran phung por de yi tshad mas grub pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:198a-11: rnam par shes pa'i bag chags dag las nam mkha'i dkyil du rmi lam dang mtshungs mthong zhes grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:198a-12: gang phyir dmus long mig med yid kyis de ni mig dang ldan zhing ma yin te phyir min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:198a-13: mig gi rnam shes khams las mig dang bcas pas phyi rol gzugs las yin gyi bag chags min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:198b-0: gang zhig sgra rnams ma lus rna bas thos pa de yang 'on pa rnams @198b kyis thos pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:198b-1: sna nad bcas bas gang zhig dri yi rdul phran 'dus pa min zhing nad med pas de 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:198b-2: lce yi nad can ro mi myong la de nyid la yang nad med lce yis myong bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:198b-3: rnam par shes pa skye mched bcu gnyis rnam par bral ba tshad mas bsgrub par bya ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:198b-4: rdul phran 'dus pa'i 'gro bas kyang ni 'gro ba mthong nas mi shes pa yis tshad ma yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:198b-5: drag po dang ni tshangs pa'am seng+ges kyang ni shes pa rnam par rig pa tsam du byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:198b-6: rdul phran rnams kyi bral ba mthong nas thim par 'gyur ram bsdus sam yang na 'gags par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:198b-7: skye ba med cing 'gag pa med la mang po 'dus sam 'dus pa min par rab tu byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:198b-8: 'di ni thub pas nam mkha'i chad ma byas la rgyal ba rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyi yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:198b-9: rang rgyal rnams dang nyan thos lha dang lha min klu dang bdag lta bu yi rgyal sras rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:198b-10: gza' dang rgyu skar rnams dang nam mkha' sa steng dag tu skyes pa bud med drang srong rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:198b-11: khro bo rnams dang srin po sha yi dam tshig can gyi stag gzig byol song dmyal ba rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:198b-12: gang zhig rnam par mi rtog dang ldan rang gzhan bral ba stong nyid dus gsum ngo bo nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:198b-13: rnam pa thams cad rdul phran gyis stong nam mkha'i dkyil ltar son pa'am rmi lam sgyu ma bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:198b-14: gang zhig thams cad mkhyen pa gzigs pa dri ma gsum bral rnam par mi rtog de ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:199a-0: gang gis de rtogs sems la dri med dri ma ldan pa mkhyen pa nyid ni sangs rgyas @199a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:199a-1: te; ;gang zhig sbyin pa la sogs lam dang dge bcu lam dang byang chub phyogs sogs chos rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:199a-2: byams pa la sogs gnas dang rang bzhin bral ba stong pa la sogs rnam par thar pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:199a-3: tshul khrims la sogs phung po gang zhig yul dang bral ba'i rnam pa kun tu mi rtog pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:199a-4: de rnams byed po gang zhig stobs bcu'i stobs ldan nyan thos rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:199a-5: gang zhig gzugs sogs khams drug dang ni yul drug kyang ste rdul phran phung po'i rnam 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:199a-6: phyi rol sngon po'i gzugs la sogs pa'i yul can rang lus sa dang dri la sogs pa drug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:199a-7: stong pa snang dang mun pa sa gsum gnas su rnam pa kun nas rnam par mi rtog pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:199a-8: snang bas rab tu sad pa rab rib rnam par bral ba 'gro drug gnas pa'i srog chags min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:199a-9: 'phags pa'i yul gyi rgyal po bde gshegs dam tshig can la sangs rgyas lam ston mdzad pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:199a-10: klu sgrub rdo rje can yang srid pa gsum gyi bla mas chos kyi dbyings su lung bstan cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:199a-11: nyams pa rnams kyi gos sngon can la sha yi dam tshig can gyi ston pa byang chub rdo rje ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:199a-12: ye shes mtha' can nag po'i ming can gzhan yang ma dhu ma ti srin po'i dbang po 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:199a-13: ye shes ming can rdo rje dril bu lag rdub dag kyang de bzhin thod par chang 'thung zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:199b-0: kha tv'am ga dang rus pa'i rgyan cha chang snod cang te'u ster ba @199b nag po'i ming can no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:199b-1: slob ma rnams la ges sngon dang ni kun tu rgyu ba ster ba na bza' sngon po can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:199b-2: sha yi dam tshig can gyi thod pa can la rdo rje'i phyag rgya ster ba byang chub rdo rje 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:199b-3: gos sngon can ni rta mchog bdag po dpal ldan ha la sogs pa'i ming can gyis bsnun 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:199b-4: ye shes rdo rje'i skyon gyis slob dpon rab tu 'khrugs pas mig gnyis sa la ltung bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:199b-5: rab tu khros pa'i kha can thod pa can gyi pho nya gzhon nus nag po'i khrag 'thung byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:199b-6: sha yi dam tshig can gyi spyod pa 'gal ba de dag sangs rgyas pa rnams spong mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:199b-7: mchog gi thugs rje can gyi 'jigs byed kyis bstan thod pa can gyis rgyal po la 'doms pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:199b-8: gang gi ming gis rnam rtog yid kyis thugs rje min zhing sems can phung po byams pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:199b-9: de rnams bzang po'i thabs ni sna tshogs sha yi kha zas gzhan gyi nor 'phrog 'dod pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:199b-10: log par g-yem pa dge ba rnam par bral bas skye ba 'di nyid la ni 'grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:199b-11: skyes bus mtho ris gnyis skyes 'jigs byed la sogs phyugs kyi sha yis mchod pa'i mchod sbyin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:199b-12: de thos sangs rgyas lam ni seng+ge 'phrog byed kyis bshad tshangs pa'i chos ni rnam par spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:199b-13: khro bo'i dbang po srin po'i dbang po gnyis skyes phyugs kyi sha yis rgyal pos mchod par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:199b-14: gang yang rung pa blo gros dman pa dge ba rnams bral de ni bdud kyis bslu bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:200a-1: po'i sha yi dam tshig can gyi rgyal pos mchod par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:200a-2: mtho ris dbang phyug 'dod phyir gnyis skyes phyugs kyi sha dang khrag gis bgos pa'i mgo bo yis; ;nges par mnar med dmyal bar rtag tu'ang sdug bsngal dmyal ba ba la ster bar 'gro bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:200a-3: gang las bskal pa'i rgyal po stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug rnams kyis nges par thon par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:200a-4: bdud kyis sha yi dam tshig can gyi yi dvags mkha' 'gro rnams la sgyu ma byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:200a-5: sems can bslu phyir kha cig tu ni 'jigs pa min bar bdag nyid gzugs ni ston par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:200a-6: lha rnams sha yi dam tshig can gyi lha ma yin rnams zad par bya phyir sgyu ma byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:200a-7: sems can rnams ni bskyang phyir kha cig tu yang bdag nyid gzugs ni 'jigs byed ston par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:200a-8: long ba brlag phyir 'jig pa'i dus kyi ma lha'i 'jig byed dus ni me lha rab tu byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:200a-9: bde byed kyis bsad lha ma yin te khrag kyang srin po rnams kyis 'thud bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:200a-10: nya dang rus sbal phag rgod mi yi seng+ge lha ma yin rnams brlag phyir khyab 'jug skyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:200a-11: nya dang de bzhin ri dvags la sogs 'o ma nags tshal dgon par khyab 'jug gis mi bza'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:200a-12: sa gsum bla mas yi dvags mkha' 'gro rnams ni smin phyi [?] su byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:200a-13: mtshan mo rgyu ba'i bdag pos r'a ma na yi chud ma dbrog phyir gnas 'jig gzugs su byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:200b-0: @200b 'jigs sde med pas skyabs seng bu rnams sha yi dam tshig can gyi bram ze'i gzugs kyis bcings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:200b-1: kir mi ri yis sha yi ched du sum cu'i stobs can srin po'i rigs kyi chos byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:200b-2: lha dang klu yi dbang po rnams kyi dam tshig 'dir ni rgyal po chen po rig par byos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:200b-3: lha bshos 'bras chan khur ba zho dang 'o ma mar dang bcas pa 'o thug sha khar rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:200b-4: khro bo rnams dang srin po rnams la phyugs kyi sha yi gtor ma 'bras chan khrag dang chang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:200b-5: sangs rgyas rnams la snying po lnga dang bu ram zhor bcas 'bras chan lhung bzed dka' thub la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:200b-6: khrus bcas sbrang rtsi mar gsar za zhing tsandan me tog dag gis mgon por bcas pa mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:200b-7: gang gis chang sogs mchod pa de dag lha dang 'jigs byed dam ni he ru ka la min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:200b-8: srin po'i dbang po mtshan mo rgyu ba'i dam tshig dpal ldan rgyal po zla ba seng+ges spyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:200b-9: mdung can ma dang droo ba ti dang 'di dag rigs skyes bu bud med min te khyo mo lnga lnga yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:200b-10: gzhan yang thod pa can gyi chang snod nang gi chu yi gtsang sbra aanta la sogs yul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:200b-11: sindhu'i yul na ba lang sha za kha ba can ri gnyis skyes rgyal bo'i mi rnams chang 'thung zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:200b-12: g'a ri la sogs na ma he dhu sha ma kha bar mi se re na rta glang sha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:200b-13: de dzid stag dang mi sha za la po kar yul na bong bu rnga mo khyi yi sha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:200b-14: bram ze la sogs rnams kyis sha mi bza' ba yul 'khor chen po garnna ra yi yul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:201a-0: nyin dang mtshan gyi dus su mdangs rigs la sogs @201a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:201a-1: khyim du chang 'thung bkag la rigs skyes 'thung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:201a-2: bud med rnams kyi dbang po skyes pas mo rtags 'jib par byed cing gnyis skyes kyis bshad pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:201a-3: khrus dang gtsang sbra mi byed 'dir ni chags pa spyod pa'i pi ra'i yul la sogs pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:201a-4: pha dag shi na ma dag bu yi chung mar bag ma len pa ngas par go kha'i yul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:201a-5: rug mar spun zla'i tsha mo len la ma khar yang ni spun zla'i bu mo rang gi bus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:201a-6: so ra me dang tsam pa ka la sogs par tsha mo'i bu mo dang na tshi mo'ang yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:201a-7: spun zla'i bu mo chung mar len pa'i yul 'khor chen po karnna ta la sogs par ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:201a-8: ma ya tshi mo chung mar len la ma la yang ste khol mo len par ra'i yul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:201a-9: bod na khrus dang gtsang sbra med la pa ru ku lenta ra go stan rigs ngan yul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:201a-10: skyes pa'i bka' yis gdengs can dbang po nyin dang mtshan gyi dus su chu yi char 'bebs byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:201a-11: gal te yul chos spyod pas grub par gyur na de tshe rig byed ngag dag bden pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:201a-12: sha yi dam tshig can gyis sha za'i yul can phru gu sha dag spong bar 'gyur ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:201a-13: gang zhig rig byed byed pa drang srong mchog gi dka' thub can gyi rig byed ngag de gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:201a-14: mtho ris don du mi dang ba lang gsod cing bha gar dkrugs pa zhi ba'i btung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:201a-15: zhi ba'i rig byed dag de dag gis sems can sun 'byin pa la rab tu mkhas pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:201b-0: ba lang pags pa'i zhi ba'i btung ba bhag @201b mchog tu dkrugs pa rta yi pho rtags bcad pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:201b-1: khu ba khrag gis rnams par bgegs pa sbrang dang mar du bcas pa lce yig bsdag par bye /d /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:201b-2: de lta'i sha za'i spyod bas gal te mchod sbyin rig byed dag gis gnyis skyes rnams kyi sgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:201b-3: nges pa dang ldan zhi ba'i sems dang snying rje ldan pa'i dandi mtho ris rnam phar nyams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:201b-4: pha la sogs pa'i don du 'tsho ba byed cing khyim pa mchod sbyin dus su phyugs dag gsod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:201b-5: dka' thub rnams ni 'tshe ba spong zhing dka' thub nges par gdung zhing gong ma goms sogs yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:201b-6: dandi dka' thub rnams kyis mtho ris mchod sbyin 'gegs par 'gyur te de yang gang gi phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:201b-7: shes pas grol bas de phyir sna tshogs phyugs ngag gsod pa gnyis skyes rnams ni du 'bod 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:201b-8: lha la sogs pa mchod pa nyid pas gal te sha zos pa la nyes pa mi skyes na; ;bcu gnyis pa dang nya dang bcu bzhi klu yi tshes dang nyi ma 'pho ba'i dus dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:201b-9: khyab 'jug la sogs mchod phyir 'di rnams nyi ma bram ze rnams kyis ci phyir sha mi bza'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:201b-10: pha la gnas su sha dang rnam par bral ba'i chang bu ci phyir ster byed mkhas pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:201b-11: 'tsho ba'i pha dang ma dag gang zhig shi bar gyur na sngon gyi rigs rgyud rnam par spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:201b-12: bsod nams sdig pa'i mthu yis mtho ris ngan song dag tu rab tu skye la lus bsregs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:201b-13: gnas dang gnas su rus pa'i dum bu'i 'jog cing chang bu dag kyang ster byed su zhig ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:202a-0: ma yin su zhig pha yin de ni lus @202a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:202a-1: dang bral nas gang zhig skye gnas gzhan bzhugs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:202a-2: bram ze la sogs mchod pas gal te de yi pha ma mchod par rig byed las grub na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:202a-3: bram ze la sogs ma zhu ba yis de tshe shi ba la yang ma zhus gnod par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:202a-4: gang gi pha dag dge dang mi dge'i dbang gis yi dvags skyes nas dad pa'i kha zas slong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:202a-5: nges pa'i bu yis rab tu byin pa'i chang bu len par 'gyur la chu yang len par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:202a-6: tshangs pa la sogs pa gtso bo nyi ma lha mchog bdag po nyi ma de ni ci yis bza'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:202a-7: sems can rnams la sdug bsngal ster ba 'chi ba'i 'jigs skyed lha rnams ci yis zhi bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:202a-8: zla ba lha min dbang po'i gtso bo sems can dang bcas gtso bo ci zhig zla ba bza' de ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:202a-9: sems can rnams la bde ba ster zhing mchog tu 'jigs 'joms ci yis lha ma yin rnams skrag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:202a-10: gang zhig mtho ris lha rnams mi dang phyugs kyi sha yis bram ze rnams kyi mchod bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:202a-11: gang zhig yi dvags yi khor yug gtogs par yod pa de rnams gnyis skyes spyod yul min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:202a-12: sa la sogs pa lha yi de nyid nye bar zhig par gyur ba dbang po'i spyod yul min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:202a-13: tshangs gzugs sna tshogs nam mkha' tsam yang seng+ge dbang phyug gtso bo tshangs pa de nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:202a-14: yi dvags la sogs rlung gi lus po rang bzhin yon tan dbang las rags pa'i kha dog dman //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:202b-0: sa dang chu dang me yi lus @202b can sa dang bar snang dag tu kha dog rags sogs ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:202b-1: rlung gi reg bya'i lus can sa dang chu dang me rnams mig gis gzung bya'i kha dog gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:202b-2: dri ni sna yis gzung bya 'dir ni lce yis ro myang dag pa'i rna bas sgra rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:202b-3: rig byed tshig las gal te rlung gi gzugs ma grub cing rig byed rtog ge'i tshad ma yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:202b-4: gzugs med de yis sa dang bar snang dag tu de tshe 'byung ba'i tshogs rnams bskyod pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:202b-5: mo gsham bu dang mtshungs pa nam mkha' tsam la nam mkha'i rgyu tsam yon tan med pa gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:202b-6: gzhan dag gzugs can bzhi ste sa dang chu dang byin za rlung rnams ro yi dbang po gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:202b-7: bram ze sogs kyis mthong 'gyur khyim ni mun pa can du mtshan mor me med na yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:202b-8: byi ba la sogs phyogs dang mtshams su son pa'i gzugs kyi dngos po ma lus snang bar 'gyur; ;srin po dang ni yi dvags la sogs tshogs pa mtshan mo'i dus su lha rnams ma lus kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:202b-9: bram ze la sogs rnams kyis de ni mthong zhing nyi ma shar na skar ma ma lus kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:202b-10: bya rog srin bya lca spyad khyi rnams ma lus 'byung dang 'gyur 'gyur byung ba ma lus ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:202b-11: de bzhin lhag pa'i chang bus bsgrubs pa'i the brang dag gis ksyes bu rnams la yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:202b-12: byol srod rnams ni gang du rang gi sems la babs pa'i sa phyogs der ni gnas 'cha' la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:202b-13: de dag shes pa bram ze rnams la srid pa gang las mig gis gzung bya'i rgyu gzhan min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:203a-0: lha mo gzhon nu ma la zhugs na byung dang 'byung 'gyur @203a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:203a-1: 'byung ba ma lus ston par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:203a-2: bram ze shi nas yi dvags gyur bas rmongs pa'i lus la zhugs nas rig byed 'don par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:203a-3: sbyin bdag srin por gyur na khyim du bong ba so phag rus pa'i dum bu 'phen par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:203a-4: blo dang ldan pa'i spyod btsan rnams nye bar nyams par 'gyur ba'i yi dvags spyod pa ltos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:203a-5: mun pa bsal ba min par gyur la mun las khva ta de yi bshad pa las byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:203a-6: mya ngan med skyes khyab 'jug 'phrog byed skyes byed des na mes po khva ta mchod par 'os //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:203a-7: ba lang rgyab dpar yi kha dang gnyis skyes bong bu'i rkang pa bud med bha gar phyag byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:203a-8: khams rnams gtong la gnyis pa mar dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa blngag pa gang zhig bram ze rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:203a-9: sgra med yi ge med las nam mkhar 'gyur te nam mkha' rlung gi rten du gyur pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:203a-10: rlang las me la me las chu yin chu las sa ste sa las 'bras bu'i kha zas rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:203a-11: zas dang chu dag zos dang 'thungs las rdul phran yon tan rang bzhin g-yo ba'i lus 'de dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:203a-12: bsod nams sdig pa'i mthu yis bde 'gro rnams dang ngan 'gro'i srog chags phun po rab tu 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:203a-13: mo gsham bu yi thu bo mchog las mchog gyur mchog gang rtul phran 'bum gyi cha ltar phra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:203b-0: nam mkha' las ni mchog gi bdag nyid yul dang bral zhing yon tan med pa nam @203b mkha'i rtags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:203b-1: rtags kyi gnas ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam ma ba'i dngos po de rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:203b-2: gang yang 'di dag kun nas thim zhing nam mkha'i sa steng rtag tu zhi ba'i grub mthar ldan; ;gang zhig de yi nus pa bha ga zhes bya ba rnams gsum lam ldan sgrub mo 'jigs byed ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:203b-3: de ni nam mkha' las 'das nam mkha'i dbang phyug mchog gi mchog gyur rtsva bcings 'khyil ba can; ;nam mkha'i mtha' can thig le'i phreng ba mgo nas bshad lam bar du ba thag dang mtshungs ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:203b-4: mchu 'phyang skar ma'i mig can gnas dang 'jigs pa skyes byed za byed rnams kyi za byed ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:203b-5: gsal dang mi gsal gcig ma rig ma rigs min gzhan yang gcig tu mkha' spyod 'khor lo ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:203b-6: rig ma'i 'khor lo'i dbang phyug rigs dang rigs min gyur ba'i thar ba ster ba'i dbang gis 'bigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:203b-7: mi gsal bya rog ra yi gzhu la 'dir ni rang gi yon tan rus spal sbu yis byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:203b-8: nam mkha'i me tog lcags mda'i mda' gzhus gang dag 'bigs pa des ni rgyal po dbang bskur 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:203b-9: gal te skye dang 'jig pa'i rgyu ru sgyu ma chen mo byed dam he ru kar 'gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:203b-10: sangs rgyas pa dang mu stegs pa dag khyab 'jug gam ni rtag pa'i sgyu ma ji ltar min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:203b-11: 'di ni thub pa'i tshig las srog chags srog ni rdul phran byed dam byed du 'jug pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:204a-0: sems can rnams kyi bsod nams sdig las bde dang sdug bsngal rnag bzhin 'bras bu byin par @204a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:204a-1: 'gyur; ;gang zhig srin po yi dvags mkha' 'gro bdud kyi rigs kyi sha yi dam tshigs can gyis bsgrubs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:204a-2: grub pa'i tshig gis skye bo gzhan rnams kyis ni de rnams nges par 'bebs par byed pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:204a-3: stag la sogs pa 'ges la chu la me 'bar glang chen rengs byed mtshon bya sogs kyis min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:204a-4: sngags kyis tha brang la sogs rnams kyis sa yi 'khor yug gtogs par rje bo'i bya ba byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:204a-5: byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs rten dbang phyug lha min lha klu rnams ni sangs rgyas pas bsgrubs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:204a-6: gang gis grub pa'i ngag gis de rnams sa yi steng du 'dod pa'i dngos grub skye bo rnams la ster //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:204a-7: skal ba ngan dang nad kyis sdug bsngal 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa thams cad 'joms par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:204a-8: seng+ge la sogs 'jigs pa rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis zhi ba la sogs byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:204a-9: byang chub don du gcig tu sbyin pa la sogs lam ni dge bcu ldan las gzhan ma gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:204a-10: dbu ma'i dga' ba gcig pu bha gar dkrugs pa dang ldan 'grub 'gyur lam gzhan gyis ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:204a-11: bde gshegs dam tshig can gyi rdzogs pa'i byang chub rdo rje'i sa gzhi byang chub shing las gzhan du min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:204a-12: sha yi dam tshig can gyi grub pa yi dvags sa gzhir shing gcig las ni gzhan du min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:204b-0: bde gshegs dam tshig can gyis @204b byang chub lha las gshegs nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor la 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:204b-1: sha yi dam tshig can gyis grub pa'i yi dvags 'jug pas phran tshegs las la rab tu 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:204b-2: sangs rgyas lhas 'jug pa na bde gshegs dam tshig can la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:204b-3: grub pa'i yi dvags 'jug pa sha yi dam tshig can gyi ma mo'i 'khor lo ston byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:204b-4: sangs rgyas rnams kyi stobs bcu skyed par mdzad pa bya rgod phung po las gzhan ri la min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:204b-5: grub pa rnams kyis ri dvags rigs bskyed ston pa 'jigs byed ri las ri gzhan la ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:204b-6: dpal ldan 'bras phung chos kyi dbyings su stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' sangs rgyas pa yi rgyud rnams bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:204b-7: gang zhig drag po dur khrod dag tu phyugs kyi skye bo stobs can thod pa can rgyud ston; ;rgyal po'i rgyal srid lha khang sa steng las ni 'byung ba de rjes lha yi rgyal srid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:204b-8: gsal bar mgon po'i 'khor lo legs par bzhag par gyur bas thar pa rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur; ;rgyal po srog gcod pa las dmyal bar 'jug par 'gyur gyi gzhan du sangs rgyas bka' ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:204b-9: rgyal po bram ze la sogs gsod pas mtho ris 'jug gi gzhan du grub pa'i tshig ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:204b-10: sha yi kha zas longs spyod byed pas slar yang srid ba gzhan du lha min rigs su skyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:205a-0: sha yi kha zas longs spyod byed pas slar yang sdig gzhan lha yi @205a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:205a-2: mgo zlum dang ni yugs sa mngon spyod byed pas slar yang bong bu nyid du rab tu 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:205a-3: mgo zlum dang ni yugs sa mngon spyod byed pas slar yang srid gzhan 'jigs byed nyid du 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:205a-4: sems can phan pa byas pas bsod nams nyid la gnod pas sdig par bde bar gshegs pas gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:205a-5: sems can gnod pa byas pas bsod nams nyid la phan pas sdig par nam mkha' tsam pos ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:205a-6: sangs rgyas rnams dang 'jigs byed skyes pa bud med gdengs can rnams kyis bstan pa lha rten gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:205a-7: g-yul du zhugs pa'i stag gzig rnams kyi rta yi tshogs kyis de rnams ma lus 'jigs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:205a-8: de rnams rigs gzhi gzhan gyi nor mi len cing bden par smra dang gtsang smra rab tu 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:205a-9: gzhon nu gzhan gyi chung ma spong zhing dka' thub nges pa dang ldan rang gi chung ma bsten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:205a-10: khrus byas gang zhig 'dod pa'i sgra gcan mtshan mo so so'i dus su nyin gung phyed yol dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:205a-11: srod dang thun gsum dang dang nyi ma ri la sha ra bar gyur nas lan lngar phyag byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:205a-12: sa steng lha yul dag tu stag gzig mu stegs dag la mun can dbang pos gcig tu skyob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:205a-13: drag po'i g-yul ngor pha ltar skyob par byed cing bu dang bran bzhin 'gyur la rgyal po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:205b-0: rgyal po 'thab mo yin @205b pas gnyis skyes phyugs kyi sha yis 'jigs byed la sogs mchod nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:205b-1: sna tshogs sems can gnod pa byed cing gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa yis gdung rgyud 'chad pa 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:205b-2: grub pa bya di dbang po sbyin pa mi phyug sa zhabs dang dum bu zhes bya thod pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:205b-3: dge slong klu sgrub zhes bya yon tan ma lus 'byung khungs sems can kun la phan 'dogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:205b-4: slob dpon 'od brtan zhes bya gcod byed chu yis grub pa stong phrag bcu dang bcas pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:205b-5: gzhan yang de ltar rab tu grags kyang kye ma de lha ta yang dam par gyur pa rmongs pa yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:205b-6: dge bcu'i lam gyis grub par gyur ba 'phags pa'i lha dang sva ba'i na bza' rta dbyangs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:205b-7: phyogs kyi glang po gzhan la phan pa'i bsam pa btsun pa zla ba padma'i myu gu zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:205b-8: pod go sa la rtog pa'i rgyal po ma lus nag po rgyal po aindra bo dhi dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:205b-9: de bzhin gzhan dang de rnams mthong yang mi bdag 'jigs byed 'phrog byed sogs kyis byin gyis brlabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:205b-10: sa dang chu dang byin za rlung dang nam mkha' mkha' tsam gdong lnga pa la yan lag drug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:205b-11: de yi dbyangs yig ring dang thung bas 'gyur gyi gzhan la dbyangs yig yon tan la sogs min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:205b-12: nyi ma gang du tshangs pa'i sa bon nye bar 'jigs par 'gyur ba des na dus kyi phyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:205b-13: sa gzhi skyong ba mchod na 'dir ni g-yul ngor kla klo dang ni mu stegs 'jigs par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:206a-1: lnga rnams rang bzhin yon tan mtshungs pa dbyangs yig yon tan la sogs min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:206a-2: aa sogs ma ning dbyangs yig stobs bcu mnga' bas gsung ste nyi ma 'thab mo zad phyir ra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:206a-3: ring dang thung ba mtshungs pa gang du aa ko ka ni ring po phyugs bdag tshig las 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:206a-4: de phyir ma ning yod la ai ko ya na tsa mi byed po'i phyogs nas nges par bskyod; ;thog ma'i lo nas nam mkha' mkha' dang gzhan yang zla ba tsin tsi ni yi dbang phyug 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:206a-5: de yi bka' yis yi dvags dbang bsgyur dus la ka sogs grogs ldan sgur mor byin brlabs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:206a-6: phyi nas sa stong son pa'i gnas dang zhing gi lha gang drug cu rtsa brgyad kla klo yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:206a-7: mgon po ma dhu ma ti bu dang bu mo sbun zla skyes pa rnams kyis 'jigs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:206a-8: der ni bco brgyad lo la brgya yis brgya la bsgyur bas ma kha la sogs 'phags pa'i yul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:206a-9: kla klo rnams kyi lha khang mun can nyi mar rtogs pa gang de nga yis brlag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:206a-10: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun rnams la skyabs gsum cho gas skye rgu rnams ni der bzhag nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:206a-11: bde la bkod de ka l'a pa gang lha gnas dga' ldan mchog tu nyi ma 'gro bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:206a-12: nam mkha' mkha' dang dus dang dbang po mig gis dus kyi dus su son pa'i lo yi tshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:206a-13: slar yang skye bo rnams ni kla klor 'jug ste ji srid bco brgyad lo la bsgyur dang bcas pa'i bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:206b-0: @206b yang nas yang [?] du nga yis rtsod pa'i dus der byung nas de rnams gzhig par bya ba nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:206b-1: ji srid sa dang chu dang me rlung nam mkha'i yon tan nam mkha' nyi zla skar ma rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:206b-2: phyogs skyong phyogs kyi gdon dang phyogs lha nam mkha' sa gzhir yi dvags bram ze ba lang sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:206b-3: sa 'og klu dang lha min rnams ni sa yi bdag pos zhi ba'i don du 'di rnams mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:206b-4: don kun grub phyir rtag tu rgyal po mi dang bcas pas sangs rgyas pa dang rgyal ba rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:206b-5: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang stong ba nyi mar bcas pa mchod rdzas rnams kyis mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:206b-6: slob dpon mchog la gzhol bas srung ba lnga po rab tu dri zhim me tog rnams kyis mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:206b-7: sngon du khrus byas gos sngon snga dro gso sbyong blangs pas nyin dang mtshan du nges par gdon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:206b-8: klog mkha' bzhi dang lnga pa gang zhig zhi [?] byed pas nyin dang mtshan du bya bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:206b-9: slar yang de la bsrung ba bya zhing nyi ma bcu ru zhi dang rgyas pa dag kyang bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:206b-10: zho dang 'bras chan nyi mar rta dang glang po'i gtor ma 'bras chan 'o ma zla bas [?]//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:206b-11: 'bras chan la sogs mig dmar gza' la me tog bcud dang bcas pa'i 'bras chan gza' lag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:206b-12: 'bras chan ser po bu ram sogs kyi gtor na lha yi bla ma 'o thug sha khar gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:206b-13: pa ba sangs la zan dron mar nag bcas pas spen pa'i nyi ma bdun par de bskyon la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:207a-0: nyi ma slar yang phyogs su glang po rnams kyi gtor ma bya zhing khur @207a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:207a-2: glang po rta mchog rnams kyis zhi dang rgyas pa'i don du sbyin sreg nyi ma la sogs gzar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:207a-3: 'bru dang mar gsar so ma dur ba mda' yi yam shing brgya dang 'o ma'i mchod yon btung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:207a-4: sbyin sreg rjes la dung phor gang ba'i zhi ba'i chu yis rta dang glang po khrus bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:207a-5: yi dvags la sogs gtor ma sran tshan sha dang chang rnams nyin mtshan dus su sbyin par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:207a-6: srin po la sogs yungs kar dang ni rdo rje phur bus phyogs mtshams gtogs par phur bus gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:207a-7: slob dpon gyis ni srung ba lnga yi cho gas rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa bsrung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:207a-8: gang dang gang gis yul mtha'i bar gyi skye rgu nyin dang mtshan du zhi dang rgyas 'gyur ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:207a-9: thog mar dbus su bsgrub bya'i ming dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang las padma lnga yis bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:207a-10: gang zhig rang bzhin yon tan dbang las sa dag kha sbyar zur brgyad de bzhin phyi rol tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:207a-11: gang zhig zur rnams dar dbyangs bcings pa phyogs dang phyogs mtshams de las rdo rje'i phreng bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:207a-12: rgyal chen phyogs kyi zur la ma lus yon tan rang bzhin ri yi rgyal po phyogs mtshams rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:207a-13: de nang zlum po'i snam bu phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su de la snod dang rtse mo'i phreng du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:207a-14: padma'i ge sar cha la 'dir ni dgra sta lcags kyu zhags pa dang ni dung nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:207b-0: chu skyes 'dab mar srung @207b 'khor gang zhig snying po yang ni de bzhin gnyis pa gsum par de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:207b-1: de ltar padma gnyis la 'gyur te nye ba'i snying po chu skyes 'dab ma rnam gnyis der //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:207b-2: klu rnams zung gi bar du phyogs dang mtshams kyi 'dab mar bar du de bzhin lha dang lha min dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:207b-3: gnod sbyin rnams dang gza' dang ma lus 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i ma mo rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:207b-4: srung 'khor 'dis ni thams cad srung bar 'gyur te khrag dang gi wang la sogs rnams kyis bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:207b-5: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang ma lus rgyas sras rnams kyis srung ba lnga sogs ma lus srung 'khor gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:207b-6: bud med bu 'dod pa las bu dang rgyal po dgra dang g-yul 'gyed pa rnams rgyal bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:207b-7: nad pa nad las grol bar 'gyur te sa yi steng du dbul po rnams kyis nor rnyed 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:207b-8: skyes pa bud med rnams kyis 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur ba sngon gyi bsod nams mthu yis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:207b-9: bsod nams sems can rnams la phan gtags dge bcu'i lam gyis mchod las nam mkha' sogs la min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:207b-10: bram ze gang zhig chang 'thung gyur dang gcer bu pa'am ral pa can nam dbyug gu can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:207b-11: dge tshul dang ni tshogs dpon dge slong dge ba rnam par bral bas grub mtha'i spyod pa nyams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:207b-12: sum cu'i dam tshig can gyi mi yi dbang pos de rnams yul nas bskrad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:207b-13: gang phyir de dag rnams kyis dge dang mi dge'i las byas drug cu'i cha shas rgyal po yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:208a-0: yugs sa mo rnams gang zhig 'khrig pa spyad @208a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:208a-1: nas ngan pa dmyal ba'i 'bras ster me la btso bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:208a-2: gang du yul na bdud ris de yod mi bdag dpung bcas der ni nam yang grub ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:208a-3: rgyal po sa yi steng du rgyal srid dang ni dgra dag 'joms dang nor rnyed bsod nams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:208a-4: skal pa bzang dang tshe dang grags pa dpal ldan lha yul sa steng grub pa'i rig pa 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:208a-5: sa steng ma lus mi yi rgyal po sbyin las byung ba tshul khrims dang bcas lha rgyal po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:208a-6: bzod pa tshul khrims skyong la nyin dang mtshan du rtsod pa las ni sbyin pa 'phel bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:208a-7: skyes bu bsam gtan la gnas mchog tu rang bzhin rnam par bral ba shes rab kyis thabs 'phel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:208a-8: shes rab thabs kyi mthu las smon lam dang yang stobs dang stong nyid ye shes rdo rje 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:208a-9: chos kyi dbyings su gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang gal te 'khor bar byon pa ma yin na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:208a-10: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' yul dang yul can lhan cig nam mkha'i khams rnams su; ;de ni rdzun gyi tshig las de bzhin bcom ldan rdo rje btsun mo'i bha gang bzhugs zhes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:208a-11: 'dod chags la sogs skyon spangs dri ma gsum dang rnam bral rdo rje sems las gzhan du min; ;changs pa la sogs lha rnams sa steng dmyal ba'i dmyal bas 'dir ni zhi ba la sogs kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:208b-0: sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma lus tshe yi tshad rnams rang rang grub mtha'i chos su @208b gsal bar byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:208b-1: tshangs pa la sogs bsod nams longs spyod mthar ni lha yul sa steng dag nas ltung bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:208b-2: srin pos byin brlabs rnams kyis de las thar pa 'dod pa de ni nam mkha'i shing 'bras bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:208b-3: byis pa rnams la rang rang ma yis rdzun tshig 'jam pos bdag nyid drung du 'khrid par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:208b-4: chang pa stong pa ston cing bdag gi lag la ril bu yod pa longs shig bu zhes brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:208b-5: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bdud kyi lag nas shin tu snyan pa'i tshig gis bdag nyid drung du 'khrid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:208b-6: nam mkha' tsam zhig ston cing bdag gi rigs kyi mya ngan las 'das longs shig bu zhes gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:208b-7: sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i dbang las rgyal bas srin po rnams la gso sbyong gsal bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:208b-8: de rnams de yis sangs rgyas nyid ni thub pa'i bka' yi gsang sngags theg pa bden pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:208b-9: gang zhig bskal pa dpag med byams dang dge bcu'i lam dang sbyin dang tshul khrims rab rdzogs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:208b-10: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' stobs bcu ldan pas sangs rgyas byang chub lung bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:208b-11: mo gsham bu ni lus med ma lus yon tan rang bzhin gang zhig rdul phran 'dus pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:208b-12: srog ni nam mkha'i me tog min te gong du rags pa'i lus la zhugs nas klo ga cing dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:208b-13: srog chags bya rog rva min bsod nams sdig pa'i dbang gis gang zhig 'gro ba rnams su 'khor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:209a-1: rdul phran phung po'i lus ni sa steng 'chi ba'i tshe na mi ltung med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:209a-2: rgyud kyi rgyal po stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pas sangs rgyas pa yi gang zhig lam bstan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:209a-3: rgyal ba stobs bcu dang ldan ston pa'i sras dang sangs rgyas pa dang lha klu dri za lha min dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:209a-4: khro bo srin po sha yi dam tshig can dang stag gzig rnams dang mu stegs spyod pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:209a-5: de kun sham bha la zhes bya bar rgyal mchog bzhugs gnas der ni nyi ma bdag gis bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:209a-6: dpal ldan 'bras phung chos kyi dbyings su stobs bcu mnga' bas gang zhig bdud rnams btul mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:209a-7: de kun sham bha la yi dpal ldan k'a la pa yi skyed mos tshal gyi dus 'khor gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:209a-8: don chen gser gyi dkyil 'khor khang pa'i sgo yi phyi rol thub pa nyi ma'i shing rtas dris; ;dpal ldan 'jam dbyangs rin chen seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs pa stobs bcu mnga' ba'i mdzad spyod gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:209a-9: dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud las phyung ba dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud phyi ma rgyud kyi snying po zhes bya ba rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-004:209a-10: lo ts'a ba sh'akya'i dge slong gnyan chung dar ma grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o ////
